With the warm weather arriving, young players are hitting the diamonds or other playing areas. Drive with care.
Express pull out a 4-3 win over the @SurreyEagles in an exciting game in Coquitlam. Eagles next game is tomorrow on home ice at 6:30 pm
The Express jump out to a 4-3 lead at 9:19 of the third with Toor catching the @SurreyEagles deep in the zone taking a cross-ice pass.
@SurreyEagles take a 3-2 lead at 2:37 of the 3rd period. Davidson scores
@SurreyEagles out shooting the Express 30-17 https://t.co/ltI0drMgzl
@SurreyEagles getting chance after chance, only to have Fenton overworked. Coquitlam being out shot 25-15 with 7:01 remaining in 2nd
@SurreyEagles Cole Williams assessed a minor for Interference
Express up on the Eagles 2-1 after one, with the @SurreyEagles out shooting Coquitlam Express by a 20-9 margin.
Express take a 2-1 lead at 15:04 of the first
@SurreyEagles tie the game at 1 on a nifty goal by Calder at 6:34 of the first

O/T at BC Place in AAA Final
4 seconds in game. Tied at 14 and Jugglers with the ball. Missed on the FG.
Ravens vs Jugglers tied at 14. 4 minutes left in 4th quarter.
Terry Fox/Notre Dame tied at 7
Great way for Seaquam Seahawks Head Coach Jerry Mulliss to end his career after 50 year.
@SeaquamSeahawks defeat Vernon 35-15 to win the Senior AA Championship. #goseahawks
@SeaquamSeahawks lead 35-15. 8 minutes left in game
Panthers get another one on the board. 35-13. Waiting for the point after. injured player down.
@SeaquamSeahawks march in another major taking a 34-7 lead with 10:21 remaining in the game https://t.co/4enUuQTTQp
Vernon finally gets on the board. Third Quarter coming to an end. @SeaquamSeahawks up 28-7
@SeaquamSeahawks add to the points. Up 28-0 third quarter
Just started the 2nd half. @SeaquamSeahawks up 21-0
Seaquam gets another TD. Up 14 -0 after 1 quarter of play
4 plays and a magic TD Seaquam 7-0
Great start for the game for Seahawks.QB sneak stopped short. TD Seahawks
